comments.body:
I'd recommend trying to stay as close to the names we use in `ClientExperimentalCapabilities`.

https://github.com/scalameta/metals/blob/8dc77885d48f5ebd7b97f59b17c6ef850beb7c73/metals/src/main/scala/scala/meta/internal/metals/ClientExperimentalCapabilities.scala#L6-L16

diffHunk:

+
+final case class InitializationOptions(
+    statusBar: String = "off",
